channel.title: Welcome Screen - $5
channel.description:
:confused:
Hey there, Ive just added the interface for this welcome screen under public void initialize() { Ive tryed ripping from another source but i get errors, How can i edit the rest of the text?
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/mcum1a56r5j1cbt/ws.png[/img]
If someone can tell me how to do this, Ill chuck you $5

item.title: Welcome Screen - $5
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

public void sendWelcomeScreen() { sendInterface(15244); sendInterface(15819); sendString("Welcome to RuneScape", 15257); sendString("\\nYou have not yet set any recovery questions. It\\nis @or2@strongly @yel@recommended that you do so. If\\nyou don't you will be @or2@unable to recover your\\n@or2@password @yel@if you forget it, or it is stolen.", 15259); sendString("You have 0 unread messages in your\\nmessage centre.", 15261); sendString("You are currently a member!\\n\\nYou have @gre@29 @yel@days until your\\nmembership expires.", 15262); sendString("Jagex wishes you a Merry Christmas", 15769); sendString("and a Happy New Year!", 15770); //sendString("Don't fall for silly scams! Check BOTH trade windows!", 15264); sendString("You last logged in @red@a while ago @bla@from: 127.0.0.1", 15258); if(player.getBankPin().hasBankPin()) { sendString("\\nYou have a Bank PIN!", 15270); } else { sendString("You do not have a Bank PIN. Please visit a bank\\nif you would like one.", 15270); } }

Read full topic
